channel.title: World of RuneScape
channel.description:
[size=18pt]World[b]Of[/b]RuneScape[/size]
Well some of you may of heard of world of Warcraft, some may have not. But I'm wondering if I made something similar to World of Warcraft, would you'd play it? If I do make it, I will be using the RuneScape 508 HD Cache. In World of Warcraft there are two different sides you can choose. There are those sides:
[b]Alliance: These are the Human-like race, there are the friendly side of the game.[/b] Picture of Alliance: [img]http://www.file-extensions.org/imgs/app-picture/3744/world-of-warcraft.jpg[/img]
[b]Horde: These are the more evil, ugly looking side, in other words the bad side.[/b] Picture of Horde: [img]http://media-2.web.britannica.com/eb-media/30/93230-004-35B0C3AA.jpg[/img] I only got 1 picture of each race for horde & Alliance. But you get what I mean.
Okay so basically when they start of there going to have to choose which Side there going to be on. The commands will look like this:
::alliance ::horde
Once they have chosen there Side, they will go to there designated home. In this case Alliance will be at Lumbridge & Horde at Falador. So if a Horde were to type ::home it would take them to Falador, this is vice versa for Alliance. The horde will start of with custom red amour, and Alliance with custom Blue amour.
There will be skills, or as in World of Warcraft there called Professions. Here are some of the Professions:
[ul][li]Mining[/li] [li]Enchanting - Making weapons/amour more powerful[/li] [li]JewlCrafting - Making Rings/Necklaces with stats to make HP higher and Str[/li] [li]Tailoring[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Herbalism[/li] [li]LeatherWorker[/li] [li]Skinning[/li] [li]Inscription[/li] [li]Engineering[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Blacksmithing[/li] [li]Alchemy[/li] [li]First Aid[/li][/ul]
To read about what each do, click the following link: http://www.worldofwarcraft.com/info/professions/
Note: Each player is only aloud to have 2 professions at once.
[b]Understanding the PvP[/b] Well basically, there is going to be an arena where Alliance can fight Horde (You don't lose your stuff here). Every time you kill you opponent you get Honor Points (I'm going to use warrior guild tokens :P). You can spend these honor Points at you City's PvP Vendor, to buy rare & better amour.
This is just an idea, and I will need some help (On professions).
Thanks,
~Justin

item.title: World of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:77, topic:317943”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=414453.msg3080484#msg3080484 date=1262121379]
This is a good idea, I think. Obviously you could not get very close to actual WoW gameplay without a team of modelers ect, but it would be interesting to see how far you could get.

What cache version would you be using?

Good Luck.
[/quote]508 is all I know :S (Never tried anything else)

And yea it won’t be close to how WoW-play is but so far it’s stuff like this,

  • Home Towns
  • PvP Arena (Made with objects)
  • 1 WoW weapon lol…
  • You can attack enemy’s when you go to there home town
  • There are a lot of sanctuary’s (Meaning both horde an alliance can be near each other, yet not attack.
  • Flight Paths = Gnome Glider lol
  • Horde can only wear red armor/blue for alliance…
  • Commands lead to there side’s areas - Etc: ‘::home’ will take alliance to lumb, and horde to fala[/quote]

That sounds, if u take out the last thing, An edited version of C-wars… Fly over to enemys and attack, Neutral middle zone, ect. ect…

Read full topic
